row.keys: q w e r t y u i o p at open-square
a s d f g h j k l semi-colon colon close-square
z x c v b n m comma period slash underscore
bang double-quote hash dollar percent amp apos open-paren close-paren 0 equal tilde pipe
Q W E R T Y U I O P grave open-curly
A S D F G H J K L plus asterisk close-curly
Z X C V B N M open-angle close-angle question underscore
